text: "Promise Me" is a 1990 debut single by Beverley Craven and is the leading single from her debut studio album Beverley Craven. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in the Netherlands and Ireland, number 2 in Belgium and number 6 in France. ==Track listings== All songs were written by Beverley Craven. 7-inch and mini-CD single # "Promise Me" – 3:35 # "I Listen to the Rain" – 2:55 ==References== Category:1990 songs Category:Debut singles
title: Promise Me (Beverley Craven song)
